resources.name: Health Check
resources.description: Get the health status of the API and its dependencies

resources.name: Chat (Automated Tool Execution)
resources.description: Send messages to LM Studio with automatic tool execution. Tools will be executed automatically when LM Studio returns JSON tool calls.

resources.name: Chat (Legacy - Manual Tool Calling)
resources.description: Send messages to LM Studio without automatic tool execution. Use this if you want to manually handle tool calls via /call endpoint.

resources.name: Chat - Multi-Tool Workflow
resources.description: Example of a multi-tool workflow that will automatically execute search, math, and file operations.

resources.name: Chat - Non-Streaming
resources.description: Non-streaming chat that returns a complete JSON response instead of chunks.

resources.name: Chat with Overrides - Non-Streaming
resources.description: Non-streaming chat with LM Studio parameter overrides for creative writing.

resources.name: Chat with Overrides - Streaming
resources.description: Streaming chat with LM Studio parameter overrides for technical explanations.

resources.name: Chat with Overrides - High Creativity
resources.description: High creativity settings for creative writing tasks like poetry.

resources.name: Chat with Overrides - Low Creativity
resources.description: Low creativity settings for technical documentation and factual explanations.

resources.name: Chat with Overrides - Balanced
resources.description: Balanced settings for general conversation and mixed tasks.

resources.name: WebSocket Chat
resources.description: Connect via WebSocket for real-time chat communication

resources.name: Tool Demo - File Operations
resources.description: Demonstrates file operations: createDirectory, writeFile, copyFile, listFiles, getFileInfo, deleteFile

resources.name: Tool Demo - Search & Math
resources.description: Demonstrates search and math tools: search, math, writeFile

resources.name: Tool Demo - Archive Operations
resources.description: Demonstrates archive operations: writeFile, zipFiles, unzipFile

resources.name: Tool Demo - File Search & Grep
resources.description: Demonstrates file search tools: writeFile, grep, findFiles

resources.name: Tool Demo - Network & System
resources.description: Demonstrates network and system tools: fetch, executeCommand, writeFile

resources.name: Tool Demo - Complete Workflow
resources.description: Complete workflow demonstrating multiple tools: createDirectory, writeFile, search, math, zipFiles, deleteFile

resources.name: List Tools
resources.description: Get a list of all available tools and their metadata

resources.name: Call Tool - Math
resources.description: Execute the math tool with a mathematical expression

resources.name: Call Tool - Search (DuckDuckGo)
resources.description: Search using DuckDuckGo (default, no API key required)

resources.name: Call Tool - Search (Google)
resources.description: Search using Google (requires GOOGLE_API_KEY and GOOGLE_CX env vars)

resources.name: Call Tool - Search (Bing)
resources.description: Search using Bing (requires BING_API_KEY env var)

resources.name: Call Tool - Search (Brave)
resources.description: Search using Brave (requires BRAVE_API_KEY env var)

resources.name: Call Tool - Fetch
resources.description: Fetch raw content from a given URL

resources.name: Call Tool - Read File
resources.description: Read text content from a sandboxed file

resources.name: Call Tool - Write File
resources.description: Write text content to a sandboxed file

resources.name: Call Tool - Delete File
resources.description: Delete a sandboxed file

resources.name: Call Tool - List Files
resources.description: List files in a sandboxed directory

resources.name: Call Tool - Zip Files
resources.description: Compress multiple sandboxed files into a .zip archive

resources.name: Call Tool - Unzip File
resources.description: Extract a .zip archive into the sandbox

resources.name: MCP Initialize
resources.description: Initialize a Model Context Protocol (MCP) connection

resources.name: MCP Tools List
resources.description: Get a list of available tools via MCP protocol

resources.name: MCP Tools Call - Search
resources.description: Execute a search tool via MCP protocol

resources.name: MCP Tools Call - Math
resources.description: Execute a math tool via MCP protocol

resources.name: MCP Tools Call - Fetch
resources.description: Execute a fetch tool via MCP protocol

resources.name: MCP Tools Call - Files
resources.description: Execute a files tool via MCP protocol

resources.name: MCP Tools Call - WriteFile
resources.description: Execute a writeFile tool via MCP protocol

resources.name: MCP Tools Call - DeleteFile
resources.description: Execute a deleteFile tool via MCP protocol

resources.name: MCP Tools Call - ListFiles
resources.description: Execute a listFiles tool via MCP protocol

resources.name: MCP Tools Call - ZipFiles
resources.description: Execute a zipFiles tool via MCP protocol

resources.name: MCP Tools Call - UnzipFile
resources.description: Execute an unzipFile tool via MCP protocol

resources.name: MCP Tools Call - CreateDirectory
resources.description: Execute a createDirectory tool via MCP protocol

resources.name: MCP Tools Call - Grep
resources.description: Execute a grep tool via MCP protocol

resources.name: MCP Tools Call - ExecuteCommand
resources.description: Execute an executeCommand tool via MCP protocol

resources.name: MCP Resources List
resources.description: Get a list of available resources (files) via MCP protocol

resources.name: MCP Resources Read
resources.description: Read a resource (file) via MCP protocol

resources.name: MCP Prompts List
resources.description: Get a list of available prompt templates via MCP protocol

resources.name: MCP Prompts Get
resources.description: Get a prompt template via MCP protocol

resources.name: MCP (Model Context Protocol)
resources.description: MCP-compliant endpoints for standardized tool integration
